title: Price drop: T216 Chief Bender (white cap)
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: Price drop: T216 Chief Bender (white cap)
posts.post_content: Having the thin-paper cardstock and (a clean) "Never Go Out" reverse, this is the scarcest of the three Kotton types. Email me if you need a larger scan.[STRIKE]$750.[/STRIKE] $700.
